description: Navigation: Automation Hub includes 'Events Catalog' item (v2 screen)
Routing: /msp/automation-hub supports tab=events-catalog (or dedicated route) and query params
Deep link: accept ?eventType=... to preselect/highlight event
Header: render title/subtitle matching mockup
Header: system status pill shown (v1 static 'Operational')
Header: 'Define Custom Event' CTA (tenant-only)
Filters: search input filters by name/description/event_type
Filters: category dropdown lists categories (system + tenant)
Filters: status dropdown (Active/Draft/Beta/Deprecated)
Filters: source toggle (All/System/Tenant)
Filters: view toggle (Grid/List) persists in localStorage
Filters: clear filters action resets to defaults
Catalog data: load combined tenant + system event catalog entries
Catalog data: normalize fields (event_type, name, category, description, payload_schema_ref, tenant/null)
List/grid: stable sorting (category then name) with optional 'most active' sort
Pagination: supports page size (grid 24, list 50) and shows result counts
Event card: show icon (category-based mapping with fallback)
Event card: show event name and event_type
Event card: show status badge (Active/Beta/Draft/Deprecated)
Event card: show short description with line clamp
Event card: show schemaRef badge (known/unknown/missing)
Event card: show attached workflows count (published v2 triggers)
Quick metrics: compute 'Executions' for last 7 days on each card
Quick metrics: compute 'Success rate' for last 7 days on each card
Quick metrics: compute 'Avg latency' for last 7 days on each card
Quick metrics: handle missing data states (show '-' / '—')
Card actions: 'Simulate' button opens simulate dialog for selected event
Card actions: 'Metrics' button opens metrics panel for selected event
Card actions: 'Attach' button opens attach flow (new workflow)
Details drawer: open on card click (or list row click)
Details drawer: show full event description + metadata (category/source/schemaRef)
Details drawer: schema preview shows top-level props and required fields
Details drawer: 'View full schema' modal uses syntax highlighting and copy button
Details drawer: attached workflows list derived from workflow_definitions.trigger.eventName
Details drawer: attached workflows row shows name/version/status + system/paused badges
Details drawer: 'Open in designer' deep-links to workflow designer for the workflow
Details drawer: 'Detach' button available per attached workflow
Simulate dialog: schema-driven form mode from payload_schema_ref (schema registry)
Simulate dialog: JSON mode editor with JSON parse errors and schema validation errors
Simulate dialog: correlationKey input (optional) with helper text
Simulate dialog: advanced payloadSchemaRef override (defaults to catalog ref)
Simulate dialog: submit calls submitWorkflowEventAction (v2 ingestion) and returns startedRuns
Simulate dialog: show success summary (event id, status, matched wait/run, started runs) and links
Simulate dialog: show failure summary with error_message from ingestion
Simulate dialog: persist last used correlationKey per event_type (localStorage)
Metrics panel: date range picker (default last 7 days)
Metrics panel: summary stats (total/matched/unmatched/error)
Metrics panel: quick run stats (runs started, success rate, avg duration) for range
Metrics panel: time series chart (daily buckets) for executions
Metrics panel: recent events table with pagination (last N)
Metrics panel: deep link to workflow events list filtered by event_name
Attach flow: 'Attach → New workflow' creates draft workflow with trigger.eventName preset
Attach flow: draft workflow payloadSchemaRef defaults to event payload_schema_ref when present
Attach flow: draft workflow sets trigger.sourcePayloadSchemaRef from event catalog schemaRef
Attach flow: navigate to workflow designer selecting the created workflow
Detach flow: confirm dialog shows impact (publishes new version removing trigger)
Detach flow: detach publishes a new workflow version with trigger removed
Detach flow: detaching a system workflow requires workflow:admin
Detach flow: after detach, UI refreshes attached workflows + counts
Custom event: open 'Define Custom Event' dialog
Custom event: create event_catalog entry with name/event_type/category/description
Custom event: select payload_schema_ref from schema registry (preferred)
Custom event: optional advanced inline payload_schema editor (JSON) with validation
Custom event: enforce event_type uniqueness per tenant
API: listEventCatalogWithMetrics returns paginated events with quick metrics and attach counts
API: listAttachedWorkflowsByEventType (published) returns workflow summary rows
API: getEventSchemaByRef resolves payload_schema_ref via schema registry (and returns JSON schema)
API: getEventMetricsSummary + timeSeries + recentEvents endpoints
API: createWorkflowFromEvent endpoint wraps createWorkflowDefinitionAction with prefilled trigger/schema
API: detachWorkflowTriggerFromEvent endpoint publishes new version removing trigger
API: createCustomEvent endpoint wraps createEventCatalogEntry with validation
Permissions: view requires workflow:read; simulate/attach/detach require workflow:manage; detach system requires workflow:admin
Audit: simulate/attach/detach emit audit log entries including event_type, workflow_id, workflow_version
Redaction: recent event payload preview respects workflow event redaction rules
Performance: catalog loads with parallel queries and avoids N+1 attached-workflows calls
